page.title: 16AN AVERAGE DAY OF A CHILD
page.content: This is an account of a day by a 9 year old girl living in Longborough: "My favourite day is Monday because I see all my friends at school again.I get up at 6 a.m. to play with my hamster.For breakfast I have rice crispies.I walk across the road to school.It starts at 9 a.m. when the bell is rung.After assembly we do language & reading skills.In the afternoon we have mathematics & science followed by games with Swell School.After school I have an early tea because I go to Brownies in Stow with my friend & her mum.My dad brings us back.At Brownies we play games like Cuthbert's Cow & Giant's Garden.We do painting & sometimes we do gardening at Stow Church.We also go to parades. We have to work hard to earn our badges.When I get home I go to bed."
